Helen Walker

WotD42 - Bison

Sep 6, 2015

I have nothing, not a thing...

It's taken 6 weeks for us to hit a word that hasn't made me have an thought worth writing down. I reckon that's pretty good going.  And the point of this process isn't to beat myself up for doing it imperfectly.

We all have down days, days where what normally works doesn't work. That's just part of the deal.

Today's #PositivePostIt word is #Bison #Fail #Blog http://helenwalker.net/2015/09/06/wotd42-bison/ #Quote

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Sep 6, 2015 at 2:07pm PDT

And if today's post is a little disappointing? Here's a joke that my friend gave me to add a little value...

What's the difference between a buffalo and a bison?

You can wash your hands in a buffalo!
